title: 2016 OPL Grand Finals Cosplay Contest - Results
body:
Hey everyone,

We've been blown away by the quality of all your entries to this year's OPL Finals Cosplay Contest, which you can check out [here](http://woobox.com/a6w2tj). We're excited to announce the winners!

The panel selected the winning entries based on three criteria:
- accuracy and attention to detail,
- craftsmanship and the quality of construction,
- ability to embody the champion's personality and mannerisms.

All winning players will receive accommodation and flights to Brisbane for the OPL Grand Finals event on August 13th.

If you're attending the [OPL Grand Finals at the Courier Mail Piazza](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oplfinals-2016), make sure to keep an eye out for these amazing cosplayers before the games start!

**Winners**

All honourable mentions will receive a ticket to the OPL Finals in Brisbane.

replies.body: That udyr cosplay is fuckin godlike
what ....i thought that was a volibear

Its the Beard, it sets of my Beard envy

But is the reason i look at all of the photos

Nice Work
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I'm not screaming but NO I AM SCREAMING!!

Thanks so much guys, can't wait to see everyone there! <3
Definitely deserved it amazing work and effort!
Your Akali is amazing - congrats :D
These are all so epic!
that darius is freaking dope.
So Shaco was the one who killed Sasuke's whole clan!
Ohh shit, waddup

here comes dat boi
These are incredible!
Words are not needed friend, bask in the glory that is these cosplay

So many amazing entries! Totally blown away by the level of quality! 

Even beyond the winners and honorable mentions - [it's worth taking a look at all the other entries as well! ](http://woobox.com/a6w2tj)
Taliyah is so cute

yey :D
Gonna take up a bit of space getting my darius there lol but totally worth it! :D

Gahh so excited :D my first cosplay got a mention C: I can't wait for OPL!! {{champion:35}}
That's your first cosplay? That's amazing! When I first saw the photos I screamed a little. In fear, but also awe. ;)
:p Yup! Thank you so much :D I've gotta up the creepy for OPL though ;)
Great freakin' job everyone! These look amazing!

NICE COSPLAY. YOU GIRLS/BOYS DID AMAZING JOB OF DESIGNING THOSE COSTUMES!!!! **GJ**
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
That {{champion:35}}  tho XD .... luv it :D
udyr costume the real MVP

Thank you so much!!! I can't wait to show my {{champion:267}} at OPL!!
It's safe to say I may have shed a {{item:3070}} or two when I saw this
JUST WOW!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfcchi,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2016-07-27T04:30:39.790+0000)
>
> That Nami cosplay just screams photoshop....

I have a picture from a Sydney convention of what it looks like in person :) 
[Here it is](https://scontent.fadl1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/13450287_1121736787849747_2387112167834008506_n.jpg?oh=0d72dc82f0e49fca7bfb01b25cf18583&oe=5818D7DC)

I'm actually just leaning against a ladder with my feet on a stool. Those were edited out. So yes, there was some photoshop involved, but the costume was not altered in any way (sorry that the photo is not great, I don't actually have many nice full body photos of the outfit sadly)

> [{quoted}](name=Merlin Fyre,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=00180000,timestamp=2016-07-27T07:14:13.729+0000)
>
> I have a picture from a Sydney convention of what it looks like in person :) 
> [Here it is](https://scontent.fadl1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/13450287_1121736787849747_2387112167834008506_n.jpg?oh=0d72dc82f0e49fca7bfb01b25cf18583&oe=5818D7DC)
> 
> I'm actually just leaning against a ladder with my feet on a stool. Those were edited out. So yes, there was some photoshop involved, but the costume was not altered in any way (sorry that the photo is not great, I don't actually have many nice full body photos of the outfit sadly)

Yeah there's a few tiny tailor alterations we could make that'd get you out of just a sitting position when it's complete, make you a mobile nami ;) if you're interested i'll do a few basic paint sketches to help visualize the outfit changes, how are you in platforms/boots/heels?

edit; does dj sona's board have a functional speaker on each side or is it a model? 
Thinking outside the box again, it really wouldn't be hard, with riot's "permission" to play all 4 of DJ Sona's ability sfx with 4 buttons added onto it leading into the background dj sona songs :)

> [{quoted}](name=ToTaL ViRGiN,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=001800000001,timestamp=2016-07-28T22:43:09.739+0000)
>
> Yeah there's a few tiny tailor alterations we could make that'd get you out of just a sitting position when it's complete, make you a mobile nami ;) if you're interested i'll do a few basic paint sketches to help visualize the outfit changes, how are you in platforms/boots/heels?
> 
> edit; does dj sona's board have a functional speaker on each side or is it a model? 
> Thinking outside the box again, it really wouldn't be hard, with riot's "permission" to play all 4 of DJ Sona's ability sfx with 4 buttons added onto it leading into the background dj sona songs :)

I am able to be completely mobile in my Nami outfit - it has a zipper up the front of the tail that I can undo and allows me to take my feet out of the tail and walk around. I just prefer the overall look of the outfit when the tail is being worn properly. It definitely makes me feel like a real mermaid!

Here's the DJ Sona's page if you want to ask her about anything :)
https://www.facebook.com/ZaphyCosplay/?fref=ts

> [{quoted}](name=I Like Dota 2,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2016-07-26T12:02:38.336+0000)
>
> Is that DJ Khaled in an Udyr costume?

Thought id dust off my OCE account to ask, whos DJ Khaled?! 

Although, if it leads to free drinks? YAS I R KHALED.

Also thanks for the beard comments. I grew it for my Robert Baratheon cosplay. Then kept it for the Udyr shoot. Now I have to convince work to let me keep it for another 2 weeks :p

shout outs to Udyr Shaco and Tali, mainly for effect, the fact that its a dude doin it well, 

don't really get into the cosplays that go for huge amounts of photoshop, effects and spend more than they should for a costume =/ p.s; nor bring a hugely expensive camera or pseudo photographer with a $2500 camera

runner up mention for dj sona, the design in your light and pads would have been fiddly also :) and i think you have them on a waist strap to balance, not an entire board, however, you may want to consider incorporating a X suspenders for pants/an extra rig to balance the sona turntables, in the costume so you can make her full board and use your back to balance it / support it comfortably.

> [{quoted}](name=ToTaL ViRGiN,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2016-07-24T22:12:08.078+0000)
>
> shout outs to Udyr Shaco and Tali, mainly for effect, the fact that its a dude doin it well, 
> 
> don't really get into the cosplays that go for huge amounts of photoshop, effects and spend more than they should for a costume =/ p.s; nor bring a hugely expensive camera or pseudo photographer with a $2500 camera
> 
> runner up mention for dj sona, the design in your light and pads would have been fiddly also :) and i think you have them on a waist strap to balance, not an entire board, however, you may want to consider incorporating a X suspenders for pants/an extra rig to balance the sona turntables, in the costume so you can make her full board and use your back to balance it / support it comfortably.

Sometimes it's hard for people who live in rural areas to get the setting they want. I don't live by a coastline, so my friend and I did a studio shoot for my Nami instead :) 
Also, the DJ Sona is Zaphy Cosplay on facebook. If you want to give her a suggestion for her costume, you could leave her a message there

> [{quoted}](name=Merlin Fyre,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=00120001,timestamp=2016-07-25T02:27:22.997+0000)
>
> Sometimes it's hard for people who live in rural areas to get the setting they want. I don't live by a coastline, so my friend and I did a studio shoot for my Nami instead :) 
> Also, the DJ Sona is Zaphy Cosplay on facebook. If you want to give her a suggestion for her costume, you could leave her a message there

I've actually got a more appropriate idea for Nami that would require far less photoshop, more costume design work, probably make a better picture and you'd look quite attractive doing it, it's more of a hybrid human/mermaid look than raw mermaid/fish sort of look. 

Drop me a facebook if you want both DJ Sona / Nami, neither is a personal stab, just more i guess, im in my 30's so a mature look at it, how to teak it from looking like props/photoshop, to more of a theatric/movie set up, whilst making it practical a bit more, i can't see Nami doing much other than sitting in 1 spot for her cosplay :P but i have an idea that could make you a mobile "human" nami, whilst at face value, still have the mermaid look down.

Or if you have a more "public" profile that you don't mind posting, post it under and i'll add... 

I just realized my facebook emails probably not a good idea to share and i think im on private. 

But hmmm

Shane Nilsson in Sydney? If it's not locked down to hard private, havent checked in a good 6-9months, probably been made public again by Zuckerberg


And as for Rural, i can think of a couple of easier shots you can think of also, not just adapting an outfit to being more mobile, unless the entire outfit is photoshopped, in which case, you've got a ground zero project ahead :P 

i can think of 3 awesome photo's you could do as a nami in rural areas still, some travel may be required, but nothing too major that the basic car couldn't cope with i'd imagine. 

Just need one decent water source / waterhole / large enough pond and a willingness for 1 of the photos, to get the outfit partially wet, as you'd be submerged breaching the surface, you can dump a good 1/3rd of the outfit for the picture, still tasteful, still sexy without busting your bits out for attention :)

Would help if you know a decent make up artist also for the face / scales, but even then, you can buy "scales" to temporarily glue on your cheek bone lines easily and remove them after. 

edit 2; just remembered, im a very blunt person, just making it clear its in no way meant to be taken as a negative but as positive constructive criticism, you've all done effort i would never be that bothered with to spend time, money etc, most i'd do is a morph suit..... Which if league makes a Deadpool rip off as a skin, i might just do one day. 

You've both done amazingly well still and done things a good 99% of the community enjoys but doesn't engage in doing themselves, you should both be proud regardless of peoples comments, good or bad alike :)

Much <3 at you both

> [{quoted}](name=ToTaL ViRGiN,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=001200010000,timestamp=2016-07-25T19:21:38.873+0000)

so here's the thing, nobody asked you :)))))))))))
Also, these are the winners, and funnily enough, you're not on this list.
Don't give you unwarranted criticism~

> [{quoted}](name=RealFrosty,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=0012000100000001,timestamp=2016-07-26T10:23:24.867+0000)

> Also, these are the winners, and funnily enough, you're not on this list.

Funnily enough, this thread is about appreciating and commenting on the Cosplay entries... Which my opinions are about. Which i even said, i wouldn't do. 

Do you want to try and state the obvious more and be a lame troll to get some forum cred?

> [{quoted}](name=ToTaL ViRGiN,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=unq6Q6l3,comment-id=00120001000000010000,timestamp=2016-07-26T20:59:26.574+0000)

> 
> Do you want to try and state the obvious more and be a lame troll to get some forum cred?

To be fair she's already got cred....she's the Sejuani

Also, in response to a different comment, thank you! I was also the Sona and I am really glad that you like the etwahl! I went by the shape of her etwahl's in-game model as opposed to the splash art model which most people use. I made it in three days before a convention
